J. Pauphilet
dcterms:description: This dataset pertains to the machine replacement Markov Decision Process (MDP) problem, which involves ten states representing the condition of a machine and actions such as repair and wait. The dataset includes rewards and transitions modeled as described in the referenced paper.
dcterms:title: Machine replacement MDP problem

dcterms:creator: A. F. Veinott Jr
H. M. Wagner
dcterms:description: This dataset is related to the inventory control problem, where a shop owner aims to maximize cumulative revenue by deciding the number of items to order based on stochastic demand. The dataset includes the (s, S) inventory policy framework.
dcterms:title: Inventory control problem
